newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA TO HOST INVESTMENT CONFERENCE IN AUGUST.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA TO HOST INVESTMENT CONFERENCE IN AUGUST.

text.p: A conference on investing and trading in the Baltic states will take place here on August 27 and August 28, organisers said on Monday.
The conference includes a key-note address from Latvian Economics Minister Guntar Krasts.
Other participants include Riga bourse chief Uldis Cerps, Lithuania stock exchange director Rimantas Busila and Hansapank head of interest rate products Erkki Raasuke.
It will deal with the development of local financial markets, risk management strategies and the legal framework for investing in the Baltics, organisers ICM said in a brochure for the conference.
